languages.text: "Откуда тебе-то знать, как открываются эти врата? Подозрительно много доверия между двумя друкари".
"How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."
languages.original_text: "Откуда тебе-то знать, как открываются эти врата? Подозрительно много доверия между двумя друкари".

traits.locale_text: "And how do you know how to unseal that Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too hard to believe."
"And how do you know how to unseal that Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too hard to believe."
"And how do you know how to unseal that Gate? I find such deep trust between the two Drukhari too good to be true."
"And how do you know how to unseal that Gate? I find such deep trust between the two Drukhari too good to be true."
"How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."
"How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

languages.text: « Et comment savez-vous de quelle manière ouvrir ce portail ? Je trouve une telle confiance entre deux Drukharis trop belle pour être vraie. »
languages.original_text: "How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

traits.locale_text: « Et comment savez-vous de quelle manière ouvrir ce portail ? Je trouve une telle confiance entre deux Drukharis trop belle pour être vraie. »

languages.text: “你怎么知道如何打开那扇门？你们可是黑暗灵族。她这么相信你，我觉得有点难以置信。”
languages.original_text: "How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

traits.locale_text: “你怎么知道如何打开那扇门？你们可是黑暗灵族。她这么相信你，我觉得有点难以置信。”

languages.text: 「どうやってその門の封印を解く方法がわかったんだ？デュカーリの間にそこまでの深い信頼関係があるとは、どうにも信じがたいんだが」
languages.original_text: "How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

traits.locale_text: 「どうやってその門の封印を解く方法がわかったんだ？デュカーリの間にそこまでの深い信頼関係があるとは、どうにも信じがたいんだが」

languages.text: "Woher wisst Ihr, wie man das Portal öffnet? Ein solch tiefes Vertrauen zwischen zwei Drukhari ist wirklich zu schön, um wahr zu sein."
languages.original_text: "How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

traits.locale_text: "Und woher wisst Ihr, wie man das Portal öffnet? Ein solch tiefes Vertrauen zwischen zwei Drukhari ist wirklich zu schön, um wahr zu sein."

languages.text: «¿Y cómo sabes tú abrir ese portal? Tanta confianza entre dos Drukhari me parece demasiado buena para ser cierta».
languages.original_text: "How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

traits.locale_text: «¿Y cómo sabes tú abrir ese portal? Tanta confianza entre dos Drukhari me parece demasiado buena para ser cierta».

languages.text: "Geçit'in nasıl etkinleştirildiğini nereden biliyorsun? Birbirlerine samimiyetle güvenen iki Drukhari'ye denk gelmek, kulağa fazla iyi geliyor."
languages.original_text: "How do you know how to unseal the Gate? I find such deep trust between two Drukhari too good to be true."

traits.locale_text: "Geçit'i aktif hâle getirmeyi nereden biliyorsun? Aralarında samimi bir güven bulunan iki Drukhari'ye denk gelmek kulağa gerçek olamayacak kadar güzel geliyor."
